title: Intentions for the Week
description: Intentions for the Week- Week 4 in 2025 Hi hiiiiii! We are on week 4! Cooper has today off of school so we are going to take it easy around here. This weekend I went for a long walk, cleaned the house, worked on our yard, and hosted Self-Check-In yesterday to map out my Intentions for the Week. I have more Currently Workbooks in my shop if you want to join me this year! I also have a digital version of the workbook that you can fill in. Here are my Intentions for the Week! Intentions this Week This week’s intentions: Mind/Body morning pages/ morning routine 30 minutes no screen after wakeup fill out my Intentions for the week calendar keep track of what I eat in my food journal keep track of movement on Apple watch move body daily work in Currently workbook check-in with calendar art time floss daily horoscope journal night on The Hope Circuit connect with my spirit work in my hobonichi cousin outdoor time/hike? pull cards/journal/video watch how much time I spend on the phone tweeze things paint nails clean house + phone a friend use my diffuser steam facial take vitamins movie night stay hydrated read before bed quality time with my cats get enough sleep Work: intentions for the week i love lists record stuff my everyday life tracy’s tracking tools hope circuit check in figure out next binder class SELF Check In! upload/edit photos recipe testing work on Currently Workbook work on THC clean up office package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club (THANK YOU!) catch up pinning on my Pinterest account Tailwind catch up on social media clean up workspace bookkeeping/pay bills emails go to P.O. Box Home grocery shop organize my office clear off work tables laundry get mulch/soil litterboxes water indoor plants water plants on deck go through pantry compost/worm bin clean kitchen clear off stairs clear off dining room table vac stairs clean out car straighten up garage refill pill case garbage/recycling Last Week’s Intentions: Mind/Body morning pages/ morning routine 30 minutes no screen after wakeup fill out my Intentions for the week calendar keep track of what I eat in my food journal keep track of movement on Apple watch workout every day work in Currently workbook check-in with calendar art time floss daily horoscope open forum The Hope Circuit connect with my spirit work in my hobonichi cousin outdoor time/hike? pull cards/journal/video watch how much time I spend on the phone tweeze things paint nails clean house + phone a friend use my diffuser steam facial take vitamins stay hydrated read before bed quality time with my cats get enough sleep Work: intentions for the week i love lists record stuff my everyday life currently 2024 Intentions for the Year tracy’s tracking tools hope circuit check in figure out next binder class SELF Check In! upload/edit photos recipe testing work on Currently Workbook work on THC clean up office package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club (THANK YOU!) catch up pinning on my Pinterest account Tailwind catch up on social media clean up workspace bookkeeping/pay bills emails go to P.O. Box Home grocery shop put away xmas stuff organize my office clear off work tables laundry litterboxes water indoor plants water plants on deck go through pantry compost/worm bin clean kitchen clear off stairs clear off dining room table vac stairs put sheets on the bed pickup the deck clean out car straighten up garage refill pill case garbage/recycling Posts to Inspire: Peanut Butter Oat Muffins Roasted Broccoli with White Beans Fettucine with Truffle Butter Sausage White Bean Soup Cream of Spinach Soup Country Italian Salad Pizza Rolls If you make a recipe from Shutterbean, tag me on Instagram! I’d love to see your creations! Here’s a mood: Mantra for the week! Feeling stuck? Make a list! Write down your intentions for the week to help hold you accountable for action. My Intentions for the Week Calendar can help!! You can start it at any time of the year! I also have a printable if you work well with a one-sheet. Here it is in a binder. It’s part of my Time Management Printable pack! Need extra help? Join my accountability group: SELF-CHECK-IN We spend Sunday mornings 9:00 AM PST-10:30 AM- PST working on our calendars and checking in together. Those are my Intentions for the Week! Wishing you a productive week. Take good care of YOU! The post Intentions for the Week appeared first on Shutterbean.
excerpt: Intentions for the Week is a weekly TO DO list/planner started by Tracy Benjamin of Shutterbean.com & The Handwriting Club!
text: Intentions for the Week- Week 4 in 2025 Hi hiiiiii! We are on week 4!  Cooper has today off of school so we are going to take it easy around here. This weekend I went for a long walk, cleaned the house, worked on our yard, and hosted  Self-Check-In yesterday to map out my Intentions for the Week. I have more Currently Workbooks in my shop if you want to join me this year!  I also have  a digital version of the workbook that you can fill in. Here are my Intentions for the Week!  Intentions this Week  This week’s intentions:  Mind/Body morning pages/ morning routine 30 minutes no screen after wakeup fill out my Intentions for the week calendar keep track of what I eat in my food journal keep track of movement on Apple watch move body daily work in Currently workbook check-in with calendar  art time floss daily horoscope journal night on The Hope Circuit connect with my spirit  work in my hobonichi cousin outdoor time/hike? pull cards/journal/video watch how much time I spend on the phone tweeze things paint nails clean house + phone a friend use my diffuser steam facial take vitamins  movie night stay hydrated  read before bed quality time with my cats get enough sleep Work: intentions for the week  i love lists  record stuff my everyday life tracy’s tracking tools  hope circuit check in figure out next binder class SELF Check In!  upload/edit photos recipe testing work on Currently Workbook  work on THC clean up office package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club  (THANK YOU!) catch up pinning on my Pinterest account Tailwind catch up on social media clean up workspace  bookkeeping/pay bills emails  go to P.O. Box Home grocery shop organize my office clear off work tables laundry  get mulch/soil litterboxes water indoor plants  water plants on deck go through pantry  compost/worm bin clean kitchen clear off stairs clear off dining room table vac stairs clean out car straighten up garage  refill pill case garbage/recycling Last Week’s Intentions:  Mind/Body morning pages/ morning routine 30 minutes no screen after wakeup fill out my Intentions for the week calendar keep track of what I eat in my food journal keep track of movement on Apple watch workout every day work in Currently workbook check-in with calendar  art time floss daily horoscope open forum The Hope Circuit connect with my spirit  work in my hobonichi cousin outdoor time/hike? pull cards/journal/video watch how much time I spend on the phone tweeze things paint nails clean house + phone a friend use my diffuser steam facial take vitamins  stay hydrated  read before bed quality time with my cats get enough sleep Work: intentions for the week  i love lists  record stuff my everyday life currently 2024 Intentions for the Year  tracy’s tracking tools  hope circuit check in figure out next binder class SELF Check In!  upload/edit photos recipe testing work on Currently Workbook  work on THC clean up office package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club  (THANK YOU!) catch up pinning on my Pinterest account Tailwind catch up on social media clean up workspace  bookkeeping/pay bills emails  go to P.O. Box Home grocery shop put away xmas stuff organize my office clear off work tables laundry  litterboxes water indoor plants  water plants on deck go through pantry  compost/worm bin clean kitchen clear off stairs clear off dining room table vac stairs put sheets on the bed pickup the deck clean out car straighten up garage  refill pill case garbage/recycling Posts to Inspire:  Peanut Butter Oat Muffins  Roasted Broccoli with White Beans  Fettucine with Truffle Butter  Sausage White Bean Soup Cream of Spinach Soup Country Italian Salad  Pizza Rolls  If you make a recipe from Shutterbean, tag me on Instagram! I’d love to see your creations!  Here’s a mood:  Mantra for the week! Feeling stuck? Make a list! Write down your intentions for the week to help hold you accountable for action.  My Intentions for the Week Calendar can help!!   You can start it at any time of the year! I also have a printable if you work well with a one-sheet. Here it is in a binder.  It’s part of my Time Management Printable pack!  Need extra help? Join my accountability group: SELF-CHECK-IN We spend Sunday mornings 9:00 AM PST-10:30 AM- PST working on our calendars and checking in together.  Those are my Intentions for the Week!  Wishing you a productive week. Take good care of YOU!
html:
Intentions for the Week- Week 4 in 2025

Hi hiiiiii! We are on week 4!  Cooper has today off of school so we are going to take it easy around here. This weekend I went for a long walk, cleaned the house, worked on our yard, and hosted  Self-Check-In yesterday to map out my Intentions for the Week.

I have more Currently Workbooks in my shop if you want to join me this year! 

I also have  a digital version of the workbook that you can fill in.

Here are my Intentions for the Week! 

Intentions this Week 

This week’s intentions: 

Mind/Body

  • morning pages/ morning routine
  • 30 minutes no screen after wakeup
  • fill out my Intentions for the week calendar
  • keep track of what I eat in my food journal
  • keep track of movement on Apple watch
  • move body daily
  • work in Currently workbook
  • check-in with calendar 
  • art time
  • floss daily
  • horoscope
  • journal night on The Hope Circuit
  • connect with my spirit 
  • work in my hobonichi cousin
  • outdoor time/hike?
  • pull cards/journal/video
  • watch how much time I spend on the phone
  • tweeze things
  • paint nails
  • clean house + phone a friend
  • use my diffuser
  • steam facial
  • take vitamins 
  • movie night
  • stay hydrated 
  • read before bed
  • quality time with my cats
  • get enough sleep

Work:

  • intentions for the week 
  • i love lists 
  • record stuff
  • my everyday life
  • tracy’s tracking tools 
  • hope circuit check in
  • figure out next binder class
  • SELF Check In! 
  • upload/edit photos
  • recipe testing
  • work on Currently Workbook 
  • work on THC
  • clean up office
  • package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club  (THANK YOU!)
  • catch up pinning on my Pinterest account
  • Tailwind
  • catch up on social media
  • clean up workspace 
  • bookkeeping/pay bills
  • emails 
  • go to P.O. Box

Home

  • grocery shop
  • organize my office
  • clear off work tables
  • laundry 
  • get mulch/soil
  • litterboxes
  • water indoor plants 
  • water plants on deck
  • go through pantry 
  • compost/worm bin
  • clean kitchen
  • clear off stairs
  • clear off dining room table
  • vac stairs
  • clean out car
  • straighten up garage 
  • refill pill case
  • garbage/recycling

Last Week’s Intentions: 

Mind/Body

  • morning pages/ morning routine
  • 30 minutes no screen after wakeup
  • fill out my Intentions for the week calendar
  • keep track of what I eat in my food journal
  • keep track of movement on Apple watch
  • workout every day
  • work in Currently workbook
  • check-in with calendar 
  • art time
  • floss daily
  • horoscope
  • open forum The Hope Circuit
  • connect with my spirit 
  • work in my hobonichi cousin
  • outdoor time/hike?
  • pull cards/journal/video
  • watch how much time I spend on the phone
  • tweeze things
  • paint nails
  • clean house + phone a friend
  • use my diffuser
  • steam facial
  • take vitamins 
  • stay hydrated 
  • read before bed
  • quality time with my cats
  • get enough sleep

Work:

  • intentions for the week 
  • i love lists 
  • record stuff
  • my everyday life
  • currently 2024
  • Intentions for the Year 
  • tracy’s tracking tools 
  • hope circuit check in
  • figure out next binder class
  • SELF Check In! 
  • upload/edit photos
  • recipe testing
  • work on Currently Workbook 
  • work on THC
  • clean up office
  • package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club  (THANK YOU!)
  • catch up pinning on my Pinterest account
  • Tailwind
  • catch up on social media
  • clean up workspace 
  • bookkeeping/pay bills
  • emails 
  • go to P.O. Box

Home

  • grocery shop
  • put away xmas stuff
  • organize my office
  • clear off work tables
  • laundry 
  • litterboxes
  • water indoor plants 
  • water plants on deck
  • go through pantry 
  • compost/worm bin
  • clean kitchen
  • clear off stairs
  • clear off dining room table
  • vac stairs
  • put sheets on the bed
  • pickup the deck
  • clean out car
  • straighten up garage 
  • refill pill case
  • garbage/recycling

Posts to Inspire: 

Peanut Butter Oat Muffins 

Roasted Broccoli with White Beans 

Fettucine with Truffle Butter 

Sausage White Bean Soup

Cream of Spinach Soup

Country Italian Salad 

Pizza Rolls 

If you make a recipe from Shutterbean, tag me on Instagram! I’d love to see your creations! 

Here’s a mood: 

Mantra for the week!

Feeling stuck? Make a list! Write down your intentions for the week to help hold you accountable for action. 

My Intentions for the Week Calendar can help!!   You can start it at any time of the year!

I also have a printable if you work well with a one-sheet. Here it is in a binder. 

It’s part of my Time Management Printable pack! 

Need extra help? Join my accountability group:

SELF-CHECK-IN

We spend Sunday mornings 9:00 AM PST-10:30 AM- PST working on our calendars and checking in together. 

Those are my Intentions for the Week! 

Wishing you a productive week. Take good care of YOU!
